meanings.sent1: After losing his job, he reearns his income by finding a new one.
meanings.sent2: She reearns her trust by proving herself reliable once more.
meanings.sent3: The hardworking squirrel reearns his nuts after the sneaky raccoon tries to steal them.
meanings.sent4: Like a phoenix, she reearns her success from the ashes of failure.
meanings.sent5: With determination, he reearns his place at the top of the leaderboard.

meanings.definition: Gains or acquires through effort or work once more.
meanings.sent1: The athlete reearns his title by training hard every day.
meanings.sent2: She reearns her reputation by helping others in need.
meanings.sent3: The magician reearns his audience's applause with a new and exciting trick.
meanings.sent4: Just like a farmer reearns a bountiful harvest after planting seeds, she reearns success through hard work.
meanings.sent5: Through perseverance, he reearns the respect of his peers.
